Question
========

Every Saturday morning, Daan rolls a pure die. If he throws a 1,2 or 3 then he goes swimming. If he throws a 4, 5 or 6 he goes he will ride his bike. What is the probability that out of the next five Saturdays he will go exactly two will be swimming?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,1250
* 0,2500
* 0,3125
* 0,5000

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0,1250: Incorrect
* 0.2500: Incorrect
* 0.3125: Correct
* 0.5000: Incorrect
